title: SmallRye Stork meets Quarkus
content: Last week, the Quarkus Insights spotlighted a new project called SmallRye Stork and its integration in Quarkus. In this blog post, we’re going to give you a concise introduction to Stork. What’s the problem? Nowadays, systems we build consist of numerous applications, often called microservices. The system’s overall behavior emerges...
